short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple StockTwits Search.  Highlight a ticker on a webpage, right-click and select StockTwits: 'Ticker'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you encounter a stock ticker on a webpage and would like to quickly access StockTwits for information about the stock, highlight the ticker, right click and select StockTwits: '????'.  A new Chrome tab will open showing StockTwits information of the ticker.
